_header: Saint Helena was in Britain born and comen of high kindred
Subjects: saints’ lives; Helena, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Helena in two MSS of the South English Legendary — couplets

BLHar2250.First Lines:
Saynt elene was in bretayne borne & comen of hegh kynradeHo
                    leued truly in þe lawe þat gode to moyses made…
BLHar2250.Last Lines:
…At Rome saynt Elene deede & þo ho buried isOure
                    lorde for saynt elene loue sende vs heuen blis

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Elyn was in bretayn born & comen of hegh kynradeShe loued
                    truly þat lawe þat god to moyses made…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…At Rome saynt Elyn dyed & þere she biried isOure
                    lord for saynt Elyn love graunte vs heuen blis Amen
